props.name: style
props.description: Inline style of the button.

props.name: class
props.description: Style class of the button.

props.name: label
props.description: Text of the button.

props.name: icon
props.description: Name of the icon.

props.name: iconPos
props.description: Position of the icon.

props.name: iconClass
props.description: Style class of the icon.

props.name: badge
props.description: Value of the badge.

props.name: badgeClass
props.description: Style class of the badge.

props.name: badgeSeverity
props.description: Severity type of the badge.

props.name: loading
props.description: Whether the button is in loading state.

props.name: loadingIcon
props.description: Icon to display in loading state.

props.name: as
props.description: Use to change the HTML tag of root element.

props.name: asChild
props.description: When enabled, it changes the default rendered element for the one passed as a child element.

props.name: link
props.description: Add a link style to the button.

props.name: severity
props.description: Defines the style of the button.

props.name: raised
props.description: Add a shadow to indicate elevation.

props.name: rounded
props.description: Add a circular border radius to the button.

props.name: text
props.description: Add a textual class to the button without a background initially.

props.name: outlined
props.description: Add a border class without a background initially.

props.name: size
props.description: Defines the size of the button.

props.name: variant
props.description: Specifies the variant of the component.

props.name: plain
props.description: Add a plain textual class to the button without a background initially.  [DEPRECATED] since v4.2.0. Use a contrast severity instead.

props.name: fluid
props.description: Spans 100% width of the container when enabled.

props.name: dt
props.description: It generates scoped CSS variables using design tokens for the component.

props.name: modelValue
props.description: Value of the component.

props.name: defaultValue
props.description: The default value for the input when not controlled by `modelValue`.

props.name: name
props.description: The name attribute for the element, typically used in form submissions.

props.name: format
props.description: Whether to format the value.

props.name: showButtons
props.description: Displays spinner buttons.

props.name: buttonLayout
props.description: Layout of the buttons.

props.name: incrementButtonClass
props.description: Style class of the increment button.

props.name: decrementButtonClass
props.description: Style class of the decrement button.

props.name: incrementButtonIcon
props.description: Style class of the increment icon.  [DEPRECATED] since v4.0. Use 'incrementIcon'.

props.name: incrementIcon
props.description: Style class of the increment icon.

props.name: decrementButtonIcon
props.description: Style class of the decrement icon.  [DEPRECATED] since v4.0. Use 'decrementIcon'.

props.name: decrementIcon
props.description: Style class of the decrement icon.

props.name: locale
props.description: Locale to be used in formatting.

props.name: localeMatcher
props.description: The locale matching algorithm to use. Possible values are 'lookup' and 'best fit'; the default is 'best fit'. See [Locale Negotation](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Intl#locale_negotiation) for details.

props.name: mode
props.description: Defines the behavior of the component.

props.name: prefix
props.description: Text to display before the value.

props.name: suffix
props.description: Text to display after the value.

props.name: currency
props.description: The currency to use in currency formatting. Possible values are the [ISO 4217 currency codes](https://www.six-group.com/en/products-services/financial-information/data-standards.html#scrollTo=maintenance-agency), such as 'USD' for the US dollar, 'EUR' for the euro, or 'CNY' for the Chinese RMB. There is no default value; if the style is 'currency', the currency property must be provided.

props.name: currencyDisplay
props.description: How to display the currency in currency formatting. Possible values are 'symbol' to use a localized currency symbol such as €, 'code' to use the ISO currency code, 'name' to use a localized currency name such as 'dollar'.

props.name: useGrouping
props.description: Whether to use grouping separators, such as thousands separators or thousand/lakh/crore separators.

props.name: minFractionDigits
props.description: The minimum number of fraction digits to use. Possible values are from 0 to 20; the default for plain number and percent formatting is 0; the default for currency formatting is the number of minor unit digits provided by the [ISO 4217 currency code](https://www.six-group.com/en/products-services/financial-information/data-standards.html#scrollTo=maintenance-agency) list (2 if the list doesn't provide that information).

props.name: maxFractionDigits
props.description: The maximum number of fraction digits to use. Possible values are from 0 to 20; the default for plain number formatting is the larger of minimumFractionDigits and 3; the default for currency formatting is the larger of minimumFractionDigits and the number of minor unit digits provided by the [ISO 4217 currency code](https://www.six-group.com/en/products-services/financial-information/data-standards.html#scrollTo=maintenance-agency) list (2 if the list doesn't provide that information).

props.name: roundingMode
props.description: How decimals should be rounded. The default value is `"halfExpand"`, [further information](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Intl/NumberFormat/NumberFormat#roundingmode).

props.name: min
props.description: Minimum boundary value.

props.name: max
props.description: Maximum boundary value.

props.name: step
props.description: Step factor to increment/decrement the value.

props.name: allowEmpty
props.description: Determines whether the input field is empty.

props.name: highlightOnFocus
props.description: Highlights automatically the input value.

props.name: size
props.description: Defines the size of the component.

props.name: invalid
props.description: When present, it specifies that the component should have invalid state style.

props.name: disabled
props.description: When present, it specifies that the component should be disabled.

props.name: variant
props.description: Specifies the input variant of the component.

props.name: readonly
props.description: When present, it specifies that an input field is read-only.

props.name: placeholder
props.description: Placeholder text for the input.

props.name: fluid
props.description: Spans 100% width of the container when enabled.

props.name: inputId
props.description: Identifier of the focus input to match a label defined for the chips.

props.name: inputClass
props.description: Style class of the input field.

props.name: inputStyle
props.description: Inline style of the input field.

props.name: ariaLabelledby
props.description: Establishes relationships between the component and label(s) where its value should be one or more element IDs.

props.name: ariaLabel
props.description: Establishes a string value that labels the component.

props.name: formControl
props.description: Form control object, typically used for handling validation and form state.

props.name: dt
props.description: It generates scoped CSS variables using design tokens for the component.

props.name: modelValue
props.description: Value of the component.

props.name: defaultValue
props.description: The default value for the input when not controlled by `modelValue`.

props.name: name
props.description: The name attribute for the element, typically used in form submissions.

props.name: size
props.description: Defines the size of the component.

props.name: invalid
props.description: When present, it specifies that the component should have invalid state style.

props.name: variant
props.description: Specifies the input variant of the component.

props.name: fluid
props.description: Spans 100% width of the container when enabled.

props.name: dt
props.description: It generates scoped CSS variables using design tokens for the component.

props.name: modelValue
props.description: Value of the component.

props.name: defaultValue
props.description: The default value for the input when not controlled by `modelValue`.

props.name: name
props.description: The name attribute for the element, typically used in form submissions.

props.name: options
props.description: An array of select items to display as the available options.

props.name: optionLabel
props.description: Property name or getter function to use as the label of an option.

props.name: optionValue
props.description: Property name or getter function to use as the value of an option, defaults to the option itself when not defined.

props.name: optionDisabled
props.description: Property name or getter function to use as the disabled flag of an option, defaults to false when not defined.

props.name: optionGroupLabel
props.description: Property name or getter function to use as the label of an option group.

props.name: optionGroupChildren
props.description: Property name or getter function that refers to the children options of option group.

props.name: scrollHeight
props.description: Height of the viewport, a scrollbar is defined if height of list exceeds this value.

props.name: filter
props.description: When specified, displays a filter input at header.

props.name: filterPlaceholder
props.description: Placeholder text to show when filter input is empty.

props.name: filterLocale
props.description: Locale to use in filtering. The default locale is the host environment's current locale.

props.name: filterMatchMode
props.description: Defines the filtering algorithm to use when searching the options.

props.name: filterFields
props.description: Fields used when filtering the options, defaults to optionLabel.

props.name: editable
props.description: When present, custom value instead of predefined options can be entered using the editable input field.

props.name: placeholder
props.description: Default text to display when no option is selected.

props.name: size
props.description: Defines the size of the component.

props.name: invalid
props.description: When present, it specifies that the component should have invalid state style.

props.name: disabled
props.description: When present, it specifies that the component should be disabled.

props.name: variant
props.description: Specifies the input variant of the component.

props.name: dataKey
props.description: A property to uniquely identify an option.

props.name: showClear
props.description: When enabled, a clear icon is displayed to clear the value.

props.name: fluid
props.description: Spans 100% width of the container when enabled.

props.name: inputId
props.description: [DEPRECATED] since v4.0. Use 'labelId' instead.Identifier of the underlying input element.

props.name: inputStyle
props.description: [DEPRECATED] since v4.0. Use 'labelStyle' instead.Inline style of the input field.

props.name: inputClass
props.description: [DEPRECATED] since v4.0. Use 'labelClass' instead.Style class of the input field.

props.name: labelId
props.description: Identifier of the underlying label element.

props.name: labelStyle
props.description: Inline style of the label field.

props.name: labelClass
props.description: Style class of the label field.

props.name: panelStyle
props.description: [DEPRECATED] since v4.0. Use 'overlayStyle' instead.Inline style of the overlay panel.

props.name: panelClass
props.description: [DEPRECATED] since v4.0. Use 'overlayClass' instead.Style class of the overlay panel.

props.name: overlayStyle
props.description: Inline style of the overlay.

props.name: overlayClass
props.description: Style class of the overlay.

props.name: appendTo
props.description: A valid query selector or an HTMLElement to specify where the overlay gets attached.

props.name: loading
props.description: Whether the select is in loading state.

props.name: clearIcon
props.description: Icon to display in clear button.

props.name: dropdownIcon
props.description: Icon to display in the select.

props.name: filterIcon
props.description: Icon to display in filter input.

props.name: loadingIcon
props.description: Icon to display in loading state.

props.name: resetFilterOnHide
props.description: Clears the filter value when hiding the select.

props.name: resetFilterOnClear
props.description: Clears the filter value when clicking on the clear icon.

props.name: virtualScrollerOptions
props.description: Whether to use the virtualScroller feature. The properties of VirtualScroller component can be used like an object in it.

props.name: autoOptionFocus
props.description: Whether to focus on the first visible or selected element when the overlay panel is shown.

props.name: autoFilterFocus
props.description: Whether to focus on the filter element when the overlay panel is shown.

props.name: selectOnFocus
props.description: When enabled, the focused option is selected.

props.name: focusOnHover
props.description: When enabled, the focus is placed on the hovered option.

props.name: highlightOnSelect
props.description: Whether the selected option will be add highlight class.

props.name: checkmark
props.description: Whether the selected option will be shown with a check mark.

props.name: modelValue
props.description: Value of the component.

props.name: defaultColor
props.description: Initial color to display when value is not defined.

props.name: defaultValue
props.description: The default value for the input when not controlled by `modelValue`.

props.name: name
props.description: The name attribute for the element, typically used in form submissions.

props.name: inline
props.description: Whether to display as an overlay or not.

props.name: format
props.description: Format to use in value binding, supported formats are 'hex', 'rgb' and 'hsb'.

props.name: invalid
props.description: When present, it specifies that the component should have invalid state style.

props.name: disabled
props.description: When present, it specifies that the component should be disabled.

props.name: tabindex
props.description: Index of the element in tabbing order.

props.name: autoZIndex
props.description: Whether to automatically manage layering.

props.name: baseZIndex
props.description: Base zIndex value to use in layering.

props.name: inputId
props.description: Identifier of the focus input to match a label defined for the dropdown.

props.name: panelClass
props.description: Style class of the overlay panel.  [DEPRECATED] since v4.0. Use 'overlayClass' prop instead.

props.name: overlayClass
props.description: Style class of the overlay panel.

props.name: appendTo
props.description: A valid query selector or an HTMLElement to specify where the overlay gets attached. Special keywords are 'body' for document body and 'self' for the element itself.
